## Awaiter.idle() function

Wait for the network to be idle, i.e. have no requests inflight.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
function idle(): Awaiter;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

[Awaiter](./alfa-scraper.awaiter.md)
